supervisord: Supervisor is a client/server system that allows its users to monitor and control a number of processes on UNIX-like operating systems. It shares some of the same goals of programs like launchd, daemontools, and runit. Unlike some of these programs, it is not meant to be run as a substitute for init as process id 1. Instead it is meant to be used to control processes related to a project or a customer, and is meant to start like any other program at boot time.
